TopicTitle: Can't load any vessel after launching new ship

Articles.Content:
Hi everyone.

I have this sandbox game in wich I have dozens of missions going on simultaneously (It's past year 28), ships everywhere, refueling orbit tanks, captured asteroids and comets on the aim...

 A few weeks from now I'm unable to launch anything new, for when I do, I can't load any other existing vessel. When switching to other vessel, the game stucks in the black screen. If I press ESC at that point, I can see the vessel I'm switching to behind the menu, but in odd textures and parts missing, and the game crashes there. I'm not sure if it's related to any mod I've installed recently (only new one is Kerbal Inventory For All - KIFA, but removing it didn't solve the issue), or to the new 1.11.2 update, but downgrade to 1.11.1 also didn't work. I also decomissioned a lot of old crafts, guessing if it was an overload of vessels in game, but it was of no help.

Don't know what to do. I don't wanna lose all space exploration kerbals took so long to build.

Any help would be very appreciated.

The actions you’ve tried are the best solutions so it might be the persistent save file has got corrupted. Or it might just be a rogue mod that is incompatible with your current version.
 

When it next does the black screen thing, close the game and go to your KSP folder. In the top level (ie one that contains GameData, not the GameData folder itself) there is a txt file called KSPLog. Open that up and scroll to the bottom to see if any errors/exceptions are being thrown. 
 

There is also one for ModuleManager inside the Logs folder (KIFA is just a set of MM patches from memory unless I’m thinking of something else). I don’t think that’ll show anything but no harm in looking.
